title: Emote Spamming
body:
The mastery for characters is a fun and cool twist on the game that makes it fun to "level up" a character and all, but when it comes down to it people just use the emote to spam after like a team wipe or even getting a kill and it's very frustrating to play verses. Is it possible to lower the emote timer or just make it possible for only allies to see the mastery emote? Its just very frustrating every like 10 or 15 seconds you hear that sound and see the emote. Don't get me wrong I think it adds more flare to league but if it could be less spamable or only visible to allies I feel it would help a lot because how the mastery emote is just abused over and over again just feels toxic and puts players in a bad mood at least most of them. To me, when its used in the games current state it feels like "Haha fucker suck my dick I killed your ass" no matter if they are winning or losing just puts you on tilt hard, at least for me I don't know how every one else feels but still. It just makes me feel like I am playing with a bunch of 5 year olds when something very interesting and kind of fun just gets constantly abused and used in ways that make the game feel toxic.

Let me know what you guys think.
Thanks!

replies.body: It's about perspective really. You can think they are using it because they are assholes, or you can just think, "Wow they must be seriously insecure to continuously flash mastery." :)
When I'm playing jungle I always ask my teammates to tell me if anybody flashes mastery emotes so I can camp. They always tilt harder and 8/10 times they'll start flaming their team.

You should really space out some of that paragraph, It's painful to read
Personally I don't find emote spamming all that annoying, but iirc, you can hide it by typing "/ignore (summoner name)"

Though obviously that's pretty hard to do for someone who has accents in their name, like me
ty for the info on ignoring htem helps alot
